patchouli.book_of_rune_magic.intro: Эта книга объясняет всё, что необходимо знать о рунах, их применения и способности. $(br2)$(br2)$(br2)$(br2)$(7)Автор — XxRexRaptorxX$()
message.runecraft.magical_book_jei_desc: Для получения Магического гримуара, используйте обычную книгу и достаточно опыта на Полнолунии на Алтаре.
message.runecraft.ruin_block_jei_desc: Можно её найти в Рунных храмах.
message.runecraft.rune_stone_desc: Используйте руны для активации Рунного камня.
message.runecraft.treasure_ritual_drops_: Random chance of spawning in a treasure ritual with a Lost Page at the Altar.
message.runecraft.rune_stone_jei_desc: Use runes to activate or change the power and effects on Руна Stones. Руна Stones have effects when you stand on them and release effect clouds when activated by redstone or clicking.
message.runecraft.basic_wand_crafting_je: Perform a ritual with a Page of Spells at night with enough experience levels on the Altar.
message.runecraft.orb_jei_desc: Perform a ritual with a Page of Orbs at night with enough experience levels on the Altar.
message.runecraft.spell_page_jei_desc: Describes an old Spell ritual. Use this page at night with enough experience levels on the Altar to perform the ritual. It gives the caster random spell effects.
message.runecraft.enchanting_page_jei_de: Describes an old Enchanting ritual. Use this page at night with enough experience levels on the Altar to perform the ritual. It gives the caster an enchanted book that can be written on with runes.
message.runecraft.wand_page_jei_desc: Describes an old Wand ritual. Use this page at night with enough experience levels on the Altar to perform the ritual. It gives the caster a magical wand.
message.runecraft.orb_page_jei_desc: Describes an old Orb ritual. Use this page at night with enough experience levels on the Altar to perform the ritual. It gives the caster a magical orb.
message.runecraft.alchemy_page_jei_desc: Describes an old Alchemy ritual. Use this page at night with enough experience levels on the Altar to perform the ritual. It gives the caster a random potion.
message.runecraft.banned_page_jei_desc: Describes an old banned ritual. Use this page at night with enough experience levels on the Altar to perform the ritual. It spawns a powerful creature of darkness.
message.runecraft.lost_page_jei_desc: Describes an old Unknown ritual. Use this page at night with enough experience levels on the Altar to perform the ritual. It gives the caster a random treasure.
message.runecraft.curse_page_jei_desc: Describes an old Curse ritual. Use this page at night with enough experience levels on the Altar to perform the ritual. It spawns a random cursed creature.
message.runecraft.basic_wand_jei_desc: Щелчок правой кнопкой мыши: Releases a spell ring of weakness.
message.runecraft.nether_wand_jei_desc: Щелчок правой кнопкой мыши: Releases a big Fire. Left Click: Sets a creature on fire.
message.runecraft.aether_wand_jei_desc: Щелчок левой кнопкой мыши: Lets you fly. Left Click: Let creatures fly.
message.runecraft.curse_wand_jei_desc: Щелчок правой кнопкой мыши: Releases a ring of negative spells, but also affects the user. Left Click: Curse a creature, but damages the user.
message.runecraft.holy_wand_jei_desc: Щелчок правой кнопкой мыши: Releases a healing effect cloud. Left Click: Heal creatures and damages undead.
message.runecraft.escape_wand_jei_desc: Щелчок правой кнопкой мыши: Releases a big smoke cloud and gives the user invisibility and movement speed.
message.runecraft.defensive_wand_jei_des: Щелчок правой кнопкой мыши: Generates a cobblestone capsule around the user and gives it damage resistance. Shift + Right Click: Destroys the capsule.
message.runecraft.thunder_wand_jei_desc: Щелчок правой кнопкой мыши: Changes the weather to sunshine. Shift + Right Click: Changes the weather to rain. Left Click: Sends a lightning bolt to the creature.
message.runecraft.creature_wand_jei_desc: Щелчок правой кнопкой мыши: Spawns random monsters.
message.runecraft.destruction_wand_jei_d: Щелчок правой кнопкой мыши: Destroys the selected block instant. Right Click + Shift: Spawns primed TNT.
message.runecraft.changing_wand_jei_desc: Щелчок правой кнопкой мыши: Switches between the block states of the selected block.
message.runecraft.maelstrom_wand_jei_des: Щелчок правой кнопкой мыши: Releases a ring of wither spells. Left Click: Gives creatures a wither effect.
message.runecraft.storm_wand_jei_desc: Щелчок левой кнопкой мыши: Pushes creatures far back.
message.runecraft.soul_jei_desc: Obtained from creatures killed with a Ritual Dagger. Use them at the altar to create spawn eggs from them.
